scripts.setup: npm install && ./generate-certs.sh && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../flutter-client && flutter pub get
scripts.server+react: npx concurrently -n server,react -c blue,green "npm run server" "npm run react"
scripts.server+flutter: npm run flutter:build && npx concurrently -n server,flutter -c blue,magenta "npm run server" "npm run flutter"
scripts.all: npm run flutter:build && npx concurrently -n server,react,flutter -c blue,green,magenta "npm run server" "npm run react" "npm run flutter"
